column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Thank you for writing a review
column2: Evangeline. I am very sorry to hear you were disappointed with the pizza you received. If you're open to it
column3: we would appreciate any feedback you can give to us to improve
column4: as we sincerely value the feedback of our guests. I will follow up with you via message
column5: please respond if comfortable. Thank you for bringing this to our attention.
